Method Detail

changePassword

UserBase changePassword(UserBase user)
Changes password for a local user.
pre:
Passed user object must have been validated to ensure that hibernate does not auto persist the object to the repository prior to service invocation
Parameters:
user - The user whose password should be changed
Returns:
The user object, with errors populated if change problem occured

createLoginRecord

void createLoginRecord(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Stores details of a successful login by a user.

createUser

UserBase createUser(UserBase user)
Creates a new user account in data repository.
pre:
User object must be newly created and not yet associated with backend data repository
throws:
RuntimeException When internal state requires transaction rollback
Parameters:
user - A populated user object to persist
Returns:
The stored user object if successful or the supplied user with errors on failure

throws:

Parameters:

Parameters:

generateValidationHash

void generateValidationHash(UserBase user)
Generates a new Hash to provide to the user (generally over email) to validate some account action.
pre:
Passed user object must have been validated to ensure that hibernate does not auto persist the object to the repository prior to service invocation
Parameters:
user - The user undertaking an action requiring validation

throws:
RuntimeException When internal state requires transaction rollback
Parameters:

validatePass

boolean validatePass(UserBase user)
Applies password processing rules to determine if the user pass and passConfirm values are valid. If not error objects are added to the user object. If the pass is valid it is encrypted and set as the value of user.passwd and added to the password history

validatePass

boolean validatePass(UserBase user, boolean checkOnly)
